name: places/ChIJvzTQuJRZwokR5aW4aZ7Fwi0

displayName.text: Dollar Car Rental - Manhattan - Greenwich Village DLE

formattedAddress: 99 Charles St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 99 Charles St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text:
Please avoid this place if you can. The Manger is rude as is the staff. They would not rent me my reserved car until I printed my W2 and handed it physically to them. Sorry no digital copies here!. You need to have PAPER like w2 or bank statement with your physical address
So  discrimination for the unhoused and unemployed. I told them to hold my car, I was back within the hour. I had to go print documents. I asked them to hold my car. I came back they gave my car away and would only give me a car that was an extra $40 a day. Or additional $280 for the week. All this was served up with a bad attitude.

originalText.text: I rented a Dollar Rental Car to drive to see my sick grandmother in Maryland.  I rented the car for possibly longer than I needed, with the mindset that rental companies, historically from my experience, reimburse you for your unused days.  Not the case here.   Not only did Dollar NOT refund the used days, the 2023 Jeep Compass' signal faulty.  Once I left NYC, the left blinker would stick, and to turn it off, you had to click on the right signal, then back to the middle.  By day 2, the left signal wouldn't turn off.  When I called Dollar's Road side assistance, they told me my only option was to drive over 2 hours to  Dulles Airport to exchange the car, in a massive snow storm.  I asked if I could leave it at the local airport and pick up an Avis car since Dollar didnt have a location there.  They told me I would have to pay for the $400 tow to Dulles.  I expressed how unsafe it would be to drive for several hours with left signal going, and they told me to drive with my hazard lights on!!!  By day 3 neither blinker worked, so I had to drive 4 hours back to NYC without a signal/using hand signals in December.  When we talked to the Dollar location, they said they couldn't help.  When dialling in they said you need to talk to the location you picked it up in.  Appalling customer service.  I will never rent from Dollar again.

When dialling in they said you need to talk to the location you picked it up in.  Appalling customer service.  I will never rent from Dollar again.

originalText.text: Would give 0 stars if I could. Pick up was at 7am. The agent was on the phone and made me wait in the rain until he finished. When i got in he refused me a card because my chip wasn't working and it was company policy that he could not swipe or key in the number. Nasty, rude and lazy. Avoid this location.

text.text: Would give 0 stars if I could. Pick up was at 7am. The agent was on the phone and made me wait in the rain until he finished. When i got in he refused me a card because my chip wasn't working and it was company policy that he could not swipe or key in the number. Nasty, rude and lazy. Avoid this location.

originalText.text: This place is not good. They gave me an electric kia and said that the Tesla charger adapter was inside, when they took a look they said that it wasn’t in there and that the adapters were at the charging stations.  I almost ran out of power trying to find a suitable place to charge. I recommend you go to another place if you want to rent a car.

originalText.text:
I don't think Dollar even knows this place still exists. Booked online & the pickup location I was given was WRONG. (But wait it get worse)

After locating & walking 3 miles to actually find the right place the Desk Representative informed me that they were out of full size vehicles, which was fine, she gave me a mid size but tried to charge me the full size rate.

(Not on my watch also keep in mind this woman's attitude the entire time was garbage)

And when I let her know she needs to charge me the proper amount for the car her attitude only got worse.

I receive the only car available at the time. It was NOT CLEANED & smelled like something was rotting or dying which smelled up the entire car.

Never again... 0 Starz

Then I try to make a serious complaint online & the site refuses to let me submit....STAY FAR AWAY FROM THIS LOCATION
